articles.author: Lobato Felizola
articles.title: 9000-year-old rock art discovered among dinosaur footprints in Brazil - Livescience.com
articles.description: Ancient hunter-gatherers created rock art next to dinosaur footprints in what is now Brazil.
articles.content:
As far back as 9,400 years ago, hunter-gatherers in what is now Brazil created dozens of stunning rock-art designs next to the fossilized footprints of dinosaurs, a new study finds.
